title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 46 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 46 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的诗歌，交给伶长，调用女音）神是我们的避难所，是我们的力量，是我们在患难中随时的帮助。

lineList.en: Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;
lineList.cn: 所以地虽改变，山虽摇动到海心，

lineList.en: Though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof. Selah.
lineList.cn: 其中水虽？？訇翻腾，山虽因海涨而战抖，我们也不害怕。（细拉）。

lineList.en: There is a river, the streams whereof shall make glad the city of God, the holy place of the tabernacles of the most High.
lineList.cn: 有一道河。这河的分汊，使神的城欢喜。这城就是至高者居住的圣所。

lineList.en: God is in the midst of her; she shall not be moved: God shall help her, and that right early.
lineList.cn: 神在其中。城必不动摇。到天一亮，神必帮助这城。

lineList.en: The heathen raged, the kingdoms were moved: he uttered his voice, the earth melted.
lineList.cn: 外邦喧囔，列国动摇。神发声，地便熔化。

lineList.en: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.
lineList.cn: 万君之耶和华与我们同在。雅各的神是我们的避难所。（细拉）。

lineList.en: Come, behold the works of the LORD, what desolations he hath made in the earth.
lineList.cn: 你们来看耶和华的作为，看他使地怎样荒凉。

lineList.en: He maketh wars to cease unto the end of the earth; he breaketh the bow, and cutteth the spear in sunder; he burneth the chariot in the fire.
lineList.cn: 他止息刀兵，直到地极。他折弓断枪，把战车焚烧在火中。

lineList.en: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.
lineList.cn: 你们要休息，要知道我是神。我必在外邦中被尊崇，在遍地上也被尊崇。

lineList.en: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.
lineList.cn: 万君之耶和华与我们同在。雅各的神，是我们的避难所。
